user_question: How does 5G technology impact the development of smart cities, and can you generate an image of a futuristic smart city utilizing 5G?
final_answer: 5G technology significantly enhances smart city development by providing faster data speeds, lower latency, and the ability to connect a massive number of IoT devices, enabling real-time data processing and improved urban management. Image of a futuristic smart city utilizing 5G generated.
